name: Drop It (superhardboiled)
description:
This is a short game developed for the Deepwell DTX Global Game Jam. In this game, your character gets help from the local town psychiatrist/doctor. As you progress, you notice other people need help, too!

In the meantime, you have to help guide your robot though some levels by generating terrain and objects. 

Unfortunately, there were a lot of planned features that just didn't make it in. 

Note: I was only able to create 3 actual levels for this game due to technical difficulties.
